website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 4040v4 baseball cleat brings a combination of highs and lows for its wearers. While the comfort level of the pair is deemed great by the majority of its patrons, the shoe’s fit seems to be for more narrow-footed players. Overall, this grippy model is a decent enough shoe to rock in the diamond.
pros: The majority of reviews of the New Balance 4040v4 baseball cleat indicate that the pair has a comfortable fit
Several shared that the pair is lightweight
A couple of users are highly appreciative of the overall look of the shoe, saying that the color scheme is just great
One of the players wearing the pair says that the traction of this cleat is spot on
Another says that the pair brings a good value for money
The grip and traction of this NB cleat are decent, concluded a couple of reviewers
This baseball cleat belongs to a regular price range
cons: A significant number of shoppers point out that the shoe has a narrow fit
A handful of purchasers had an issue with durability with some disclosing that their pair didn’t last a season
One user says that the pair initially feels stiff

customer_reviews.title: Great for yard slopes!
customer_reviews.text: I don't play sports. I'm 64 years old. I bought these shoes so that I can climb my steep slope behind my house that is landscaped. I used to slide down the hill when trying to weed and otherwise maintain the vegetation. Not any longer! These baseball shoes now allow me to move around the steep slope with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy T

customer_reviews.title: Why the issue with width?
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as a wide width shoe and technically it was however it was a double E which is not that much wider than a regular width shoe . This is the second pair of new balance that I have purchased through Amazon that I had trouble with concerning the width. I wear new balance most of the time and have never had an issue when purchased in person.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Walker

customer_reviews.title: The only thing stopping a new balance cleat is the growth of your child
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, I just don't buy cleat brands other than New Balance anymore. They always fit perfectly, look great and handle the beating of a full baseball season. This is the 4th pair my son has worn and his first set of metal cleats. They fit just like the previous pairs of New Balance molded cleats we've purchased. For value and quality, you can't find a better brand of athletic footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Goltermann

customer_reviews.title: Love the grip in side the shoe on the ball ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the grip in side the shoe on the ball of the foot. It will keep socks from moving and foot from slipping inside the shoe. The shoe is a bit small in the toe box, but in height not width. The outside of the shoe is great looking and made of materials that are easy to clean when that red dirt collects.

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 4040v4 Steel Spike Baseball Shoe
product_meta.description: The L4040v4 has baseball specific features all the way from the edge of each spike, to the tip of the tongue. At 1 ounce lighter than the predecessor and a flexible yet supportive plate, this spike will be sure to have you blazing around the diamond. The TPU mesh utilized in the upper helps provide durability while maintaining the breathability common in most meshes. Tuck your laces in the Lace Cage to complete the Fastest looking and performing shoe in baseball. The L4040v4!
